title: Make Potato Peel Chips
description: Turn your potato peels into delicious crispy chips instead of throwing them away! Simple recipe with just peels, oil, and spices.

title: Plastic Bottle Planters
description: Create beautiful planters from used plastic bottles for your kitchen herbs. Perfect for small spaces and reducing plastic waste.

title: Orange Peel Cleaner
description: Make natural citrus cleaner from orange peels and vinegar. Effective, eco-friendly, and smells amazing!
